features: BETTER-FOR-YOU HYGIENE: We're happier and healthier when we're clean. Having a body-friendly intimate feminine foaming wash for daily use just makes good health sense. Nourish your needs with our gynecologist-recommended, hygiene products made with natural ingredients and free of petrochemicals, parabens, and synthetic fragrances. These pH-balanced products mimic how your body works naturally, to help you feel and stay fresh.

CALMING & SOOTHING FORMULA: Ultra Sensitive Foaming Feminine Wash is formulated with fresh botanical extracts for its moisturizing properties and soothing botanical extracts to help clean, refresh and reduce abnormal odor. Our pH-balancing moisturizing foam wash contains calendula, calming cucumber, and moisturizing snow mushroom.

HELPS SUPPORT pH BALANCE: While every body is a little different, a naturally healthy vaginal biome has a low pH and a proper balance of moisture, salt, and lactic acid. Choose a gentle, pH-balanced daily feminine cleansing and moisturizing wash that's better for you and best for everyday use!

GYNECOLOGIST RECOMMENDED: Formulated with our patented Bio-Match technology, our products are designed to closely mimic your body’s natural chemistry. Whether a lubricant, a wash, a moisturizer or probiotic suppository, each product Works The Way You Do so that you can live, feel, and love your very best. 100% paraben-free, and free of artificial fragrances.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Thrilled I found this product
reviews.reviewText: I recently tried a few other feminine washes and found them to burn and dry me out. This product doesn't do that at all. It's wonderful and I'm thrilled I found it. One small pump is enough for a wash so you're not using too much. No scent at all but takes care of odor perfectly. 100% recommend. I'll definitely keep using this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this product!
reviews.reviewText: Great to use in the shower and you don’t have to use a lot and keeps me fresh and clean!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really good for sensitive women
reviews.reviewText: I love this feminine wash, I am super sensitive, but I also wanted something organic to put near a such sensitive area.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice, gentle product for what it is needed for.
reviews.reviewText: I went to give a urine spec. to my Doctor and my speciment came back " Not a clean catch". Well that got me thinking that I needed something just for that special area so from now on I will never have a specimenthat is not a CLEAN one. This product is soft and gentle on that sensitive skin and rinses well and helps me to feel so nice and fresh. Good product, very pleasing to use.B. AdamsAuburn, WA.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A fab product
reviews.reviewText: What can be said? More women should choose this product for cleaning their personal area. Being clean in this area is the way to be! Not only you know that you are clean and smell great, you know that others will NOT smell you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The only feminine wash that doesn't irritate me
reviews.reviewText: I've tried a lot of feminine washes. I have pretty sensitive skin so I look for a fragrance free option. This does not leave me feeling irritated and I feel clean afterwards. It doesn't have any added fragrance so it smells like the ingredients in it, but that's a plus for me!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I received my bottle today so I have not used it yet, however probably won't get too many uses. The bottle was half empty.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Performance And Cooling Sensation 😉
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. The product is very nice to use, after using the toilet for bladder or bowel movement and I especially use it in the shower. I learned of a product like this a couple of years back on a private site, a little more expensive, yet worth it, but my coins are working for me differently these days so I came to old faithful 😉. As I had always done stinja (an Arabic toilet cleansing process after relieving yourself to insure cleanliness down below, front and back) as a woman I wanted to enhance the clean. I just wish I had paid attention as to it being ultra sensitive, because I prefer just sensitive and a cooling sensation, I will be sure to look for that on my next purchase. Oh and a little goes a long way.
